Description: * Fixed a recent issue with {{PageRef|Bebop}} gun not using lag compensation correctly when hitting orbs
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} starting health increased from 5000 to 6000
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} health gained per minute increased from 275 to 350
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} warning sound now plays at 50% HP
* Fixed bot behavior with the new Urn locations
* Fixed some bugs with Hero Demo options not working due to a recent update
* Fixed a rare case where you could abandon a match accidentally when accepting a friend invite
* Fixed some cases where the confirmation to abandon match wasn't showing up
